sentences.en: Chemical seepage has caused untold damage.

sentences.en: Crystalline dolostone is formed by seepage - reflux dolomitization and burial dolomitization.
sentences.cn: 晶粒白云岩有两种成因:一为回流渗透白云石化;二为深埋藏白云石化.

sentences.en: Darcy's law can be applied to unsaturated flow subject to certain restrictions on seepage velocity.
sentences.cn: 达西定律也适用于渗透速度有一定限制的非饱和水流.

sentences.en: Engineering geophysics is economic, and efficient for seepage detection in dam body.

sentences.en: I intend to dig a seepage pit in the courtyard.

sentences.en: Seepage analysis is an important item for hydropower engineering.

sentences.en: Seepage from land fills can pollute ground water or surface.

sentences.en: Such infiltration, which includes seepage from streams and lakes, contributes to the ground water supply.

sentences.en: The anti - seepage system is one of the important components of sanitary landfills.
sentences.cn: 防渗系统是填埋场建设的关键问题之一.

sentences.en: The irreversibility is the essential characteristic of porous media seepage problems.

sentences.en: The results indicated coupling between the seepage permeability in low permeability rock.
sentences.cn: 实验结果表明:低渗透岩石渗流过程中存在明显的流固耦合效应.

sentences.en: Water gradually escapes by seepage through the ground.
